title: How does spiritual healing, also known as Quranic healing, differ from other forms of alternative medicine?
description: Answer: Spiritual healing, often referred to as Quranic healing in the context of Islamic practices, is a form of alternative medicine that focuses on addressing physical, emotional, and spiritual imbalances through spiritual and religious methods.
